body: In the meantime, TensorFlow's `matrix_diag` for a stack of vectors (batch x N) -> a stack of diagonal matrices (batch x N x N)  can be done by striding, as shown by [@SimonW here](https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/batch-of-diagonal-matrix/13560). `.as_strided` is still not documented, though: [#9886](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/9886)
